meanings.definition: A person who has capital, especially extensive capital, invested in business enterprises.
meanings.sent1: The wealthy capitalist owned many factories in the city.
meanings.sent2: The capitalist invested in various companies to grow his wealth.
meanings.sent3: The capitalist joked that his money was always working harder than he was.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the capitalist was a lion among sheep.
meanings.sent5: The capitalist's bank account was a bottomless pit of riches.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of capitalism or capitalists.
meanings.sent1: The capitalist system encouraged competition among businesses.
meanings.sent2: Her capitalist beliefs led her to support free-market policies.
meanings.sent3: The capitalist approach to economics was both praised and criticized.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a testament to capitalist progress and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The capitalist society thrived on individual initiative and enterprise.
